channel.title: FlashFlashRevolution?
channel.description:
There is currently a script by Miss Silabsoft that plays the song and hits almost all perfects. But! There is some problems. The script will not hit arrows touching each other (2 notes very close together), and it hits the up ^ notes, but boos every single time. If anyone has any idea how to improve, or maybe even make a new script, please do so.
Game: [url=http://www.flashflashrevolution.com/FFR_the_Game]http://www.flashflashrevolution.com/FFR_the_Game[/url]
Also here is Silabs original thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,26518.0.html
Lmao forgot to attach script, sorry, there.
